vital_signs.initial: Vital signs suggest a stable, yet concerning physiologic state considering the elevated temperatures and fluctuating heart rate.
vital_signs.prior_to_transfer: Prior to transfer, there is slight elevation in temperature and heart rate.

physical_examination.general: Well appearing obese man in obvious discomfort.
physical_examination.cardiac: RRR, normal S1/S2, no murmurs or gallop.
physical_examination.abdomen: Obese, mildly distended, soft, moderate tenderness in bilateral lower quadrants and severe tenderness in RUQ.
physical_examination.skin: Mild scattered discrete erythematous papules over trunk and extremities with scratch marks noted from chickens.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Vital signs showed a minor increase in temperature and heart rate prior to transfer. No significant changes in physical examination findings documented over the course.
